Kansas is the breadbasket of America and home to more aviation manufacturing than anywhere else. Vouch Mobile helps Kansans stay connected from Wichita's aircraft factories to the wheat fields of Western Kansas at a heartland-friendly price.

Network

AT&T Coverage in Kansas

Vouch Mobile operates on AT&T's award-winning network, providing Kansas residents with reliable 5G and LTE coverage across the Sunflower State. With 99% population coverage, you'll stay connected wherever you go.

According to the FCC Broadband Map, AT&T provides extensive wireless coverage throughout Kansas, including urban centers and many rural areas.

Benefits

Why Kansas Residents Choose Vouch

Kansas' average phone bill of $101/month takes a toll on family budgets—Vouch cuts that by 70%.

Whether you're working at Spirit AeroSystems in Wichita, farming near Garden City, or cheering on the Jayhawks, you need reliable coverage.

No credit check means KU and K-State students, new residents, and agricultural workers can sign up instantly.

AT&T's network covers Kansas from Kansas City to the Colorado border, with strong coverage along I-70 and I-35.

    FAQ

    Kansas Coverage Questions

    Everything you need to know about Vouch Mobile in Kansas

    Yes! Vouch Mobile provides 99% population coverage across Kansas using AT&T's network. From Kansas City to Wichita, Topeka to Manhattan, you'll have reliable 5G and LTE service throughout the Sunflower State.

    Vouch Mobile operates on AT&T's network in Kansas. AT&T provides coverage in major metros and along highway corridors, with LTE available in smaller communities.

    Vouch Mobile costs $30/month for unlimited talk, text, and data—no matter where you live in Kansas. The average Kansan pays $101/month for phone service, so you could save over $852 per year by switching to Vouch.

    No credit check required. Whether you're a KU student, a new Wichita resident, or rebuilding your credit, you can sign up for Vouch Mobile instantly.

    Switching is easy: check that your phone is unlocked, order a free Vouch SIM card shipped to your Kansas address, then activate online in minutes. You can keep your existing phone number—we'll handle the port.

    Yes! 5G is available in Kansas City, Wichita, Overland Park, Topeka, and other Kansas cities. Your 5G access is included free with your $30/month plan.

    AT&T's network covers populated areas throughout Western Kansas, including Garden City, Dodge City, and Liberal. Coverage may be limited in very remote areas.

    Yes. Full coverage throughout the Kansas City metro including Overland Park, Olathe, Shawnee, and other Johnson County communities.
